definition: bravery with no thought of personal safety (idiom); risking life and limb/undaunted by perils
to give up/to abandon/to give alms
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Bai Suzhen laughs in the face of death, selects the ganoderma lucidum immortal grass finally, excited goes.
sentences.chinese: 白素珍捨生忘死，終於摘取靈芝仙草，興奮而去。
